title: Topic 002 Question 032
body: You create a conditional access policy that blocks access when a user triggers a high-severity sign-in alert.
You need to test the policy under the following conditions:
✑ A user signs in from another country.
✑ A user triggers a sign-in risk.
What should you use to complete the test?
options: the Conditional Access What If tool
sign-ins logs in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)
the activity logs in Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps
access reviews in Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)
